ygData.subject: CHECK MATE!!

From: logomorph@...

Diamond::
She leaned closer to KitKat. She grabbed KitKat by the arm and pulled 
her close. Before KitKat could react, she struck. She sunk her long 
fangs into KitKat's throat and injected an overdose of venom. She 
drained her venom sack into KitKat's body and then pushed KitKat's 
body to the floor.

KitKat::
She was dumb struck as she watched Diamond sink her fangs into her 
neck. She felt the pain as the long fangs went deep inside.  She 
couldn't move, or scream.  The venom was fast acting and within 
moments, she felt light headed and dizzy. The pain was gone, and the 
room started to spin.  She didn't even feel herself fall to the 
floor. She heard her body make a small thump as she fell, but that 
was all. She had no fear in her eyes, but had a questioning look on 
her face. She stared up at Diamond as her vision became fuzzy.

Diamond::
She smiled evilly and bent down to KitKat's head. "You want to know 
why. I can tell by that look on your face."
She reached down and picked up KitKat. She walked over to the far 
corner of the room, it was darker and might conceal the body for a 
while. At least long enough to make her escape. She set KitKat's body 
in a chair in the corner.  She leaned down and grinned. "My lord 
Zardus wished it. And so it has happened. Don't worry, the venom will 
finish it's work in few moments. Your already past the point of help."
she stood up and grinned. She bowed to KitKat."you have had the honor 
of being killed by me."

With that, Diamond turned and left the conference room.  She closed 
the door behind her and walked away.  She made it to the main 
corridor.  She saw two male bots fighting and DarkMouse standing 
against the wall.  She smiled and walked past them all, calm and 
nonshallantly.  She walked out of the entrance and then outside. She 
looked around to make sure she wasn't followed. She set out in a dead 
run.  She made her way to her pod. "Pod, power up"
The pod computer started up and activated the engines.  She sat down 
in the pilot seat and engaged the thrusters.  Pressing a few buttons, 
the pod lifted up off the ground and headed off towards the Allience 
base.

::KitKat:;

She sat in the chair, her body feeling numb all over.  Her breathing 
was getting harder. She moved her arms, but couldn't feel them.  She 
opened her commlink. "Drill.....bit....help..."
